text: Alexander Kristoff (born July 5, 1987) is a Norwegian road bicycle racer. He currently rides for the cycling team UCI WorldTeam UAE Team Emirates. He won a bronze medal in the road race at the 2012 Summer Olympics. In the Grand Tour races, he won the Stages 12 and 15 of the 2014 Tour de France, the Stage 21 of the 2018 Tour de France and the Stage 1 of the 2020 Tour de France. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Norwegian cyclists Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Alexander Kristoff
